item.description:
winter comes in.. we always have a great time.... getting Hi all...

         Yes it is that time of year again..... get out your dog costumes... and your favorite dish to bring.. It will be just deserts or finger foods.. and of course if you want to drink byod..lol.

       I am hoping the weather holds up for us... if it is going to be cold and rainy we will need to reschedule to the following sat. the 29th... or yikes november....  If anyone is willing to help pay the meetup dues... that would be nice.. I have been paying for the last 6 years of 12.95 a month. If i received more than needed for the year..it will go to SARL.

       
This is a great time of year to socialize with our dogs before pictures is always a hard project but we will try...

  I will be looking for help in the a.m. to rake the leaves and make sure we got poop control done.    Please rsvp to give me an idea of who is coming...

Pug hugs Patty
item.how_to_find_us: will be in the backyard .... the house with all the dogs... cream colored house with a silver handicap ramp

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Halloweem Party
